Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a door problem.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a door problem.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
